name: Enter the Arena (Alexander Kam)
description:
This game was created as a Year 11 Software Design and Development (SDD) project for the Australian International School of Malaysia in 2019 by two students; Alexander Kam and Yuta Kataoka. The full logbook for this game, along with any accompanying documentation can be found in the link below.

In summary, this was our first venture into game development and Unity. We worked together as a team through an Agile Development Life Cycle and iterated the game upon each sprint, improving and adding features.

Full Development Logbook
